description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Koh Lanta, Thailand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Secluded Koh Lanta Beachfront Escape with Sunset Sea Views
hotels.description: Escape to a hilltop hideaway for a sun and sea getaway overlooking Koh Kwang Beach at Avani+ Koh Lanta Krabi Resort. Bask on sun-soaked beaches, dive into crystal clear waters and observe sublime sunsets with a cool cocktail in hand from the Reggae Bar. Indulge in a treatment at AvaniSpa, snorkel over vibrant coral reefs or explore mangrove forests and sea caves. Once the day is done, retire to the comfort of a lavish suite or villa and be lulled to sleep by the crashing of the waves.
